Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the application namespace of an ApplicationSpecificInformation object.
        """
kwargs = {'application_namespace': []}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The application namespace must be a string.', attributes.
    ApplicationSpecificInformation, **kwargs)
args = attributes.ApplicationSpecificInformation(), 'application_namespace', []
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The application namespace must be a string.', setattr, *args)
